channel.title: Bandos - YES ANOTHER GOD DAMN THREAD
channel.description: I'm headed to Bandos in one hour from the time of posting. I'd be nice for some people to come. Add me in-game: Equilibrate If possible, we can also skype.

item.title: Bandos - YES ANOTHER GOD DAMN THREAD
item.dc:creator: @m1lkman m1lkman
item.description:
@m1lkman wrote:

[quote=“WowILikeToCode, post:14, topic:437205”][quote author=m1lkman link=topic=539918.msg3953314#msg3953314 date=1332504148]

Awesome! I’ll have to try it sometime.

Wouldn’t recommend a solo. Heres what ya do, get 99 attack and defence, then buy torva and divine, then get ovls, then just camp at bandos for like 300kc in 1 invo

300kc?
[/quote]

yes… its quite capable with yak, uni, ovls and torva and divine… look it up on youtube.[/quote]

Didn’t know what Kc was that’s what I meant. Kc = kill count.

Read full topic
item.source: Bandos - YES ANOTHER GOD DAMN THREAD

item.title: Bandos - YES ANOTHER GOD DAMN THREAD
item.dc:creator: @Stupit Stu
item.description:
@Stupit wrote:

[quote=“Jc22493, post:8, topic:437205”][quote author=Stupit link=topic=539918.msg3953078#msg3953078 date=1332474622]

What stats are recommended for Bandos?

Flat 70s.
[/quote]

60 atk
99 str
40 def
95 pray (turm)
99 range
99 mage
85 HP

Good enough?[/quote]
Yep.
